cards.name: Potion of Paralysis

cards.name: Potion of Redundancy Potion

cards.name: Wand of Dowsing

cards.name: Wishing Ring
cards.ability: Gain 1 VP. Place this card on the bottom of the treasure deck.

cards.name: Cardinal

cards.name: Deep Friar
cards.ability: Special: After this base scores, you may move another one of your minions here to another base instead of the discard pile.

cards.name: Turner

cards.name: Holy Roller

cards.name: Bin and Gone

cards.name: Collection Plate

cards.name: Curse of Imprisonment

cards.name: Curse of Uselessness

cards.name: Good Habits

cards.name: Join the Club
cards.ability: Choose a base. All minions there get +1 power until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Remove Curse

cards.name: Hotel of Holiness

cards.name: Whack-A-Ghoul

cards.name: Dwarf King

cards.name: Loot Lover

cards.name: Gold Digger

cards.name: Gem Grabber

cards.name: Anything for Money

cards.name: Cash Out

cards.name: Cunning Plan

cards.name: Greed is Good

cards.name: Hidden Assets

cards.name: Mine!

cards.name: No! My Precious!

cards.name: Salvage

cards.name: The Mines
cards.ability: Minions here have +1 power for each treasure on them.

cards.name: Treasure Bath
cards.ability: After the first time each turn that you play a minion here, draw a treasure card.

cards.name: Fae Fighter

cards.name: Lord of the Prance

cards.name: Flower Child

cards.name: Elf Help Guru

cards.name: Dancing Root

cards.name: Trade

cards.name: Traveling Elf

cards.name: Shire Marshal

cards.name: Pestling
cards.ability: You may play an extra minion here.

cards.name: Bardling

cards.name: Quarterling

cards.name: Last Call

cards.name: Lunch Run

cards.name: Small But Tough

cards.name: Sneaksy
cards.ability: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here are not affected by other players' actions.

cards.name: Spoiled Brats

cards.name: Unexpected Party

cards.name: Subterranean Lair

cards.name: Blaster Master

cards.name: Scroll Shuffler

cards.name: Zzzzzap!

cards.name: Too Tough
cards.ability: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion is not affected by other players' actions.

cards.ability: Minions here are not affected by other players' actions.

cards.name: Favor of Hades

cards.name: Favor of Hera

cards.name: Favor of Hermes

cards.name: Favor of Poseidon

cards.name: Favor of Zeus

cards.name: My only weakness

cards.name: Trade Winds

cards.name: Gone with the Wind
